query:
WITH entities AS (
                SELECT cf.id FROM core_credit_facilities cf
                LEFT JOIN core_collaterals co ON cf.collateral_id = co.id
                WHERE co.custody_wallet_id = $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $2 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_credit_facility_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id, e.sequence
